Title: Just Say No
Writer: Adam F. Goldberg (created by), Niki Schwartz-Wright, Lewaa Nasserdeen (staff writer)
Actors: Wendi McLendon-Covey, Sean Giambrone, Troy Gentile, Hayley Orrantia
Plot: Erica tries to educate Beverly about voting; after losing a wrestling match, Barry wants to prove his athletic prowess.
